listing.listing_description: Perfectly positioned in plush Dover Heights, this villa offers fine views of downtown Sydney, with stylish interiors and a lush private garden. Guests can pass through a charming alfresco and barbecue area to a pristine blue pool, ringed by palm fronds and green trees. The separate living rooms, game room and airy balcony add to the appeal, with Sydney’s harbor and beaches tantalising close by. Guests will note the contemporary decor and clean, bright layout of the villa right away as they enter the sunlit front living room, which offers welcoming, wall-length furniture for weary travellers. Complete with entertainment system and impressive gas-fed fireplace, this is the ideal room to fall into for a relaxing afternoon or wind-down evening. With a separate TV room and a game room complete with pool table, guests’ kids can let their hair down and blow off steam in ample space, with enough room for everyone across this expansive property. With easy walk-out access to the garden, guests can utilize these spaces (plus the fully equipped kitchen) to cook, chat and converse in total contentment, The villa’s location allows for easy access to both the culinary and sightseeing delights of Sydney’s harbor, as well as the sun and sand of the city’s famous beaches. World-renowned Bondi Beach is just a handful of minutes, or a short walk, south by car, with Tamarama and Bronte beaches being even closer to the villa. Less than five minutes drive to the north, a host of golf clubs, plus waterside parks, cafes and walkways provide a wealth of day-time relaxation options along the leafy southern shore of the harbour. Guests have access to a range of world-class cosmopolitan dining and night-life options as evening closes in, with Sydney’s all-action downtown just a short ride away.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Explore the coast of Australia's easternmost edge and return to alfresco dinners and bottles of locally produced wine. An easy walk from Belongil Beach and Byron Bay town, this stand-alone villa offers a contemporary, family-friendly vision of the classic oceanside home, with high-end cooking and media technology, a private pool, and 4 split-king or twin bedrooms.Part of a new complex of 2-story homes, the villa features an ample outdoor living area for relaxing in privacy. A plunge pool and sun patio beckon you into the exquisite light, while the shaded deck offers cool shelter for barbeque meals and serene hours in the open-air lounge.Glass walls open to the interior great room, forming a seamless, indoor/outdoor space. A fully equipped kitchen serves the 2 dining tables, a breakfast bar, and a TV lounge with cozy sectional. Fresh white surfaces glow with natural light and showcase the villa's original, sea-inspired artwork. Central air conditioning and heating allow you to modulate the atmosphere to your desire.There are 2 bedrooms on each level of the home. The master and primary guest suite are on the lower level, each featuring an ensuite bathroom with rain shower. The guestrooms on the upper level enjoy a private TV lounge and shared bathroom. All of the rooms have air conditioning, ceiling fans, and twin beds that can be arranged as kings.Fat Frog Beach House is just a 7-minute walk from Byron Bay town, and about 10 minutes from Belongil Beach, while Byron Main Beach is a four-minute drive away. You're also within 10 minutes of the iconic Cape Byron Lighthouse and the sublime seascapes of Arakwal National Park.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Discover a private haven in the heart of Seminyak at Villa Tangram. Though this stylish vacation rental is set in a quiet garden and offers luxury accommodations for up to fourteen, it’s close to dining, shopping and more. Reserve this villa for a getaway with family and friends, or with its sister property, Villa Abakoi, for a special birthday or anniversary celebration, or even a Bali destination wedding.Start your holiday with a complimentary transfer to the villa and enjoy daily breakfast as well as housekeeping and chef services throughout your stay. Villa Tangram has its own pool and spacious terrace with plenty of loungers, and shares a barbecue with Villa Abakoi. In the evenings, unwind in front of the TV, set the mood with the sound system or share photos via Wi-Fi.Inside, the villa pairs traditional Balinese elements with contemporary pieces for an ambience of classic chic. Bamboo blinds separate the open-concept living room, dining room and fully equipped kitchen from the garden and pool, and can be opened or closed to let in the breeze or create shade. Throughout the villa, artwork and objets from around Bali showcase local handiwork.Villa Tangram has three bedrooms with queen beds, two bedrooms with two twin beds each and one bedroom with two twin-over-double bunk beds. All six bedrooms have en-suite bathrooms and air conditioning, and feature the same vibrant artwork as the common living areas.During your stay, the villa manager can help arrange additional services such as an in-villa massage or even a babysitter so you can relive your honeymoon with an evening out. Walk to the famed “eat street” to sample specialties, spend an afternoon at a hip cafe, browse tempting boutiques or dance the night away at a nearby beach club. Of course, you’ll also have a choice of picturesque, relatively quiet beaches, from Seminyak to Batu Belig.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Sky Loft is a stunning sub-penthouse apartment in the prestigious Darlinghurst suburb of Sydney. Situated within minutes of some of the city’s finest attractions, the home enjoys panoramic views of the downtown skyline from its wrap-around balcony and luminous interiors. Three lovely bedrooms sleep six, providing ideal accommodations for families or small groups seeking stylish and lofty comfort near the heart of this global capital.The villa's décor features mid-century modern furnishings with touches of Old World elegance and exquisite wood in the floors, dining tables, and cabinetry. Expansive glass walls join the open-concept living area with the balcony, infusing the home with ample natural light and breezes from the bay. Two sumptuous lounge areas flank the dining table: one with a beautiful crescent banquette (ideal for pre-dinner cocktails), the other with a supple leather sectional and two stylish armchairs. The dining table seats ten beneath a gorgeous chandelier, while the alfresco table on the balcony enjoys privileged views of the horizon. A vintage kitchen is equipped with chef-grade Electrolux appliances and a stunning marble bar.All three bedrooms open to the balcony, inviting dreamy morning light and nighttime breezes into your private moments. The master suite includes a king bed and an open-concept, ensuite bathroom with shower and soaking tub. The two guest suites both have queen beds, and one enjoys an ensuite bathroom as well.An elevator delivers you to the ground floor, where the extraordinary city of Sydney unfurls before you. Myriad renowned destinations—including the Australian Museum, the Oxford Art Factory, the Royal Botanic Gardens, and the Sydney Opera House—are within two to five kilometers, while Tamara Beach, Coogee Beach and Bondi Beach are in easy reach. Sydney Airport is also less than eight kilometers away, making Sky Loft a convenient choice for business trips, wedding guests, and easy weekend escapes.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Try out life as a Sydneysider at Wylde St Penthouse. This beautiful Potts Point vacation rental boasts postcard-worthy views fit for visitors from a private residence set in the midst of shopping, dining and other city amenities. Its two bedrooms are just the right size for a sightseeing trip with family and friends or a honeymoon spent exploring the area.Your holiday at the penthouse begins with a welcome hamper full of gourmet goodies and includes concierge service and Netflix access. You’ll want to spend sunny days taking in spectacular views of the skyline and Harbour Bridge from a terrace with a sitting area, dining area and barbecue. On cooler evenings, retreat to the media room and enjoy high-tech amenities from a smart TV and Sonos sound system to Wi-Fi.Inside, this luxury property is bright and modern, thanks to floor-to-ceiling windows and sleek furnishings. Large-scale artwork makes a statement in the living room, while sculptural chairs are their own form of art in the dining room. Between the living and dining rooms is a fully equipped kitchen with a breakfast bar and a cocktail bar area.The penthouse has two bedrooms with queen beds and en-suite bathrooms, including an incredible master suite with its own lounge area and kitchenette. For larger parties, there’s also a double sofa bed in the study, which has access to a hall bathroom.Wylde Street is less than a 10-minute drive from must-sees like the Harbour Bridge and Sydney Opera House, and is just a short walk from some of the best shopping and dining the city has to offer. On the warmest days, pop down to nearby Hayes Street Beach, a sandy cove that’s one of the area’s best-kept secrets, where you can go kayaking or grab a coffee from a local cafe.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Villa Sally is a stunning villa near Canguu along the southern coast of Bali, just minutes from Seminyak and Echo Beach. Secluded amid lush gardens and rice fields, the villa has the feel of a private resort, with high-end amenities for relaxation and entertainment, ample living areas both inside and out, and excellent staff and services including a chef, villa manager, housekeeping, and security. With four bedroom suites accommodating eight guests, Villa Sally is a dream vacation rental for families and groups of friends seeking vintage style, contemporary comforts, and a prime location in one of the most enchanting regions of Southeast Asia.The villa's terrace evokes the cloistered feeling of a forest oasis, while offering ample space for savoring the light and breeze of the South Pacific. Enjoy long hours by the pool, sipping cool refreshments on loungers under parasols and plunging into the refreshing water in the dappled shade of tropical trees.The capacious, open-concept veranda forms the main living space, with a sumptuous lounge overlooking the pool, an alfresco dining table, and a fully equipped kitchen. Cool tile floors, rich wood tables and walls, and beautiful artwork conjure an ambiance at once naturalistic and elegantly modern. For the night's entertainment, repair through the villa's art gallery corridor to the home theater, featuring cozy stadium seating, a large projector screen, and a piano.There are two deluxe master suites, each with king-size bed and semi-outdoor ensuite bathroom with shower and tub. Both guest suites open to the terrace and include two twin-size beds that can be converted into kings. All of the rooms enjoy air conditioning and safes among other comforting features.The villa is an easy walk to Finns Recreation Club, an outstanding, family-friendly complex with waterpark, tennis courts, and other activities. The beach and nightlife of Seminyak are about six kilometers away, and golfers are an easy drive to Nirwana Bali Golf Club. The iconic Tanah Lot Temple is just sixteen kilometers away. An easy drive to and from Ngurah Rai International Airport, Villa Sally is an excellent choice for destination wedding guests.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: This superb, three-bedroom suite is located within the world-renowned Andaz Maui at Wailea, one of the finest destinations on the island's sunset coast. Just steps from Mokapu Beach, the villa features more than 3,200 square feet of indoor and outdoor living space with breathtaking views, while the resort offers an unparalleled array of amenities and activities for experiencing the riches of this island paradise. Three ample bedrooms accommodate groups up to eight in size, making this an ideal vacation rental for families and medium-sized groups.A wrap-around lanai patio extends from the villa's interior, forming an ample space of dining and relaxing in the ocean breeze. Take a dip in your private hot tub while savoring the ocean views, and sip refreshing drinks on comfortable lounge chairs. Fire up the Viking gas grill for an afternoon barbeque, and enjoy your meal alfresco at the table for eight.The interior has been expertly decorated and furnished with fine original artwork, natural wood accents, and a beautiful color palette in harmony with the sea. Large windows and glass doors welcome ocean views and breezes into the home. A comfortable sitting area faces the horizon, while the spacious lounge features a large sofa and TV. The kitchen is fully equipped for the culinary artist among you, and the dining table seats eight on gorgeous turquoise chairs.Both the master and primary guest suite feature California king-size beds, while the second guest suite includes two queens. All three rooms enjoy ensuite bathrooms, air conditioning, and ceiling fans. The deluxe master suite opens to the lanai, with ample glass doors framing views of the ocean and palm-rich resort. It bathroom boasts a spacious walk-in shower and stand-alone tub.The Andaz Maui at Wailea offers countless ways to discover the essence of Maui. Take a dance class or ukulele lesson; enjoy a kayak ride or snorkeling trip in the crystalline ocean; or visit the resort's world-class spa. Visit one of the dozen spectacular beaches along the coast of Wailea and Makena, including Mokapu, Ulua, and Keawakapu, or explore the sublime majesty of the island's volcanoes. Outstanding shopping and dining options abound, and Wailea Old Blue Golf Course is an easy walk away.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: This exquisite luxury residence enjoys a beachfront location within the Montage Kapalua Bay resort on the northwest coast of Maui, a Forbes 5-star destination that was ranked the Best Maui Resort and Hotel by U.S News & World Report in 2018. The newly built, 3,554 square foot home features ample outdoor living and dining areas, beautiful interiors including a gourmet kitchen, and panoramic views encompassing the lush coastline and vast Pacific Ocean. Three superb bedrooms suites (two with king beds, one with a queen) accommodate families, destination wedding guests, corporate travelers, and groups of friends up to eight in size. Your vacation rental includes concierge services, a villa manager, and resort privileges at the Montage.The villa's interior and balcony are gracefully fused via wide glass doors, forming an expansive, open-concept haven bathed in the breath of the sea. The balcony includes a generous lounge area, a superb grilling station, and an alfresco dining table—all with spectacular views. The interior boasts a cozy TV lounge and open kitchen with chef-grade appliances, gorgeous cabinetry, and a breakfast bar. The dining room is just off the kitchen, featuring a lovely circular table, ocean views, and pocket doors opening to the balcony. The exquisite yet understated decor features soothing neutral tones delicate touches of vibrant, sea-inspired artwork.The superb master suite opens to a private section of the balcony, with beautiful outdoor furniture and expansive ocean views. The room features a sumptuous king bed and a deluxe ensuite bathroom with walk-in shower, soaking tub, and dual vanity. The primary guest suite has a king bed and an ensuite bathroom with shower and tub as well, while the third suite includes a queen bed and ensuite bathroom with shower.The Montage Kapalua Bay has earned the plaudits of travelers and publications from around the world, with extraordinary amenities including the 30,000-square-foot Spa Montage, the extraordinary Cane and Canoe restaurant, and two championship golf courses. Kapalua Bay Beach, just steps from the lobby of your building, has been ranked as the best in Maui, with enchanting white sands and clear waters for swimming and snorkeling.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Indulge in the ultimate villa experience at Villa Abakoi: a luxury property that offers both a quiet, private setting and a location close to the best of Seminyak. This traditional estate is tucked into a tranquil garden but is just off Jalan Drupadi, close to dining, shopping and your choice of beaches. Reserve this six-bedroom vacation rental for a getaway with family and friends, or with its sister property, Villa Tangram, for a special celebration or even a Bali destination wedding.Your holiday at Villa Abakoi includes a transfer from the airport, daily breakfast, housekeeping and more; the villa manager can help arrange additional services such as a masseuse or babysitter. With the details taken care of, make the most of the tropical weather on the terrace around the pool, dotted with loungers, and finish the evening with a meal from the shared barbecue.The villa’s main living areas are in a traditional pavilion, open sides and warm wooden floors. Rattan sofas and dining chairs create a casual, inviting feel, while Balinese artifacts and artwork incorporate vibrant color and personality. The modern kitchen is at the end of the open-concept living space and is fully equipped.Each of the six bedrooms at Villa Abakoi has an en-suite bathroom. The property has one bedroom with a king bed, three bedrooms with queen beds, one bedroom with two twin beds and one bedroom with two twin-over-double bunk beds.From the villa’s setting in Seminyak, it’s easy to walk to the famed “eat street” of Oberoi, tempting boutiques and chic beach clubs. Nearby beaches such as Seminyak, Petitenget and Batu Belig are picturesque and calm—the perfect setting for a honeymoon-style stroll along the sand or playing in the waves with the kids.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Part of the renowned Hualali Resort on the Gold Coast of Hawaii's Big Island, this spectacular private villa features panoramic views of the Pacific Ocean and the beautiful first fairway of the resort's world-class golf course. Exquisite interior and alfresco living spaces provide a dream setting for relaxation and entertainment, while the four superb bedroom suites include ensuite bathrooms and alfresco showers. With access to the Hualalai's world-class amenities, including the Four Seasons Hualalai Beach, this vacation rental offers an extraordinary balance of privacy and convenience on one of the world's most spectacular shores.Enjoy enchanting days bathing in the villa's hot tub and heated infinite swimming pool, relaxing on lovely loungers and beholding the panoramic ocean vistas. At lunchtime, relish a barbecue meal alfresco in the cool shade of the lanai, and linger in the lounge in the evening, sipping Hawaiian cocktails as the sunset transforms land, sea, and sky.An open wall joins the lanai with the interior great room, creating a lovely flow of space and air. Peaked ceilings of pickled wood, gorgeous tile floors, and beautiful chandeliers and fans evoke consummate Hawaiian class. Prepare dinner in the fully equipped gourmet kitchen, and gather together at the superb dining table. At night, sip wine in the elegant lounge, or retire to the wonderfully cozy media room. In the morning, enjoy fresh fruit and Hualalai Trading Company coffee at the breakfast bar or in the sunroom.The main house includes three bedrooms suites, two with king beds and one with two twins, while the Ohana includes a fourth bedroom, with king bed. All of the bedrooms have ensuite bathrooms and exquisite alfresco showers, as well as access to outdoor living areas. The master suite features a walk-in closet, interior sitting area, and private patio with ocean views. The primary guestroom and the Ohana have private patios as well.Beyond your private paradise, you'll enjoy privileged access to the superb offerings of Hualalai Resort, including the swimming pool, the Tom Weiskopf-designed golf course, tennis courts, and a spa. The beach at the Four Seasons Hualalai is about a mile and a half away, and you're an easy drive from Mauni Lani Golf and Hapuna Beach.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.HAWAII TAX ID #: TA-068-704-8704-01

listing.listing_description: Tucked close to the beach in the fishing village of Nelayan, Canggu Estate is a hidden gem on the southwest coast of Bali. With two stylish modern villas, an attentive full staff and resort-worthy amenities at your disposal, this luxury vacation rental is an unforgettable setting for a family reunion, anniversary celebration or intimate tropical wedding. Welcome up to forty guests in the well-appointed reception areas or invite up to twelve guests to stay in the six suite-style bedrooms.Your stay at Canggu Estate includes the services of a chef, butler, housekeeper, caretaker and villa manager; a driver and car can also be arranged at extra cost. If you’re hosting an event, smooth lawns surrounded by lush landscaping make for a beautifully private setting; if you’re just relaxing, there’s plenty of room on the sun loungers by the two pools. Flip on the sound system to set the mood, serve refreshments from the indoor bar, challenge family and friends at the ping-pong table and, as night falls, ask the chef for local specialties or old favorites from the barbecue that you can enjoy at the al-fresco dining pavilion.Simple and modern, the villas use clean lines, white walls, large windows and polished concrete floors to create bright, open living spaces. Tufted tan sectionals and ottomans are sleek yet comfortable in the sitting areas, while velour settees and wooden benches introduce texture in the dining areas. Throughout the villas, vibrant contemporary paintings, installations and murals by Indonesian artists speak to the local art scene and breathe life into the minimalist interiors. Though chef service is included, there’s also a fully equipped kitchen with a practical breakfast bar for you to use.There are four bedrooms in the South villa at Canggu Estate and two bedrooms in the North villa; all have king beds and en-suite bathrooms, and all but one of the beds can be separated into two twin beds to offer more flexible sleeping arrangements. The villas can be connected or separated by sliding wall panels, so the smaller villa can be used as a honeymoon retreat for the happy couple after a wedding or a fun getaway for older teens.Start your Bali holiday with a flight into Ngurah Rai International Airport, 20 km from the villa. If you’ve come for the area’s famous beaches, make the 1-minute walk to Nelayan Beach, popular with surfers, or the short drive to laid-back Canggu Beach, well-known Echo Beach or the surf schools at Batu Bolong. You’ll find everything from yoga studios and boutiques to live music venues and oceanfront restaurants along the beaches, but there’s plenty more to see and do in the area, from a round at Nirwana Bali Golf Club or a visit to the Tanah Lot Sea Temple to a thrilling day at Bali Treetop Adventure Park.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Stay within walking distance of restaurants, boutiques and famed Noosa Head Beach at Witta Circle. Though this vacation rental is set on a quiet residential island, it’s just steps to the heart of town and some of the most beautiful beaches in Queensland. Its location—and six bedrooms—make it a wonderful choice for a holiday in the sun with family or a getaway with a group of friends.There’s plenty of room to relax in the villa’s private outdoor areas, which feature a pool, hot tub, lounging and dining spaces, a bar and a gas barbecue. The house also has a streaming TV and Wi-Fi and, for your convenience, laundry facilities and a high chair for the younger set.Interiors by two local designers give Witta Circle an air of laid-back luxury. The rooms are bright and modern, with a free-flowing layout that meanders from living room to dining room to fully equipped kitchen. The white walls are a gallery-like backdrop for large-scale artwork and sleek, sculptural furnishings.The villa has three bedrooms with king beds—two with en-suite bathrooms, including the master suite—and one with a hall bathroom, as well as one bedroom with a queen bed and en-suite bathroom. There are also two children’s rooms with two twin bunk beds each that share access to a hall bathroom.From the tranquil island where Witta Circle sits, it’s a short walk to Hastings Street and Noosa Parade, where you can treat yourself in the boutiques or sit down to a honeymoon-worthy dinner overlooking the water. It’s a 10-minute drive or less to five different beaches, including the spectacular Noosa Main Beach, and both Noosa National Park (where you’ll find even more stunning beaches) and Noosa Springs Golf and Spa Resort are equally easy to reach.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Palms rustling in the breeze, mountains sloping down to green fields, and the sea sparkling in the distance make this contemporary villa feel like it’s set on a little piece of Bali. The architecture adds to the illusion, with a sloping roof over the great room and balconies hiding daybeds. But in fact it’s in the Australian countryside, near the beaches and surfing spots of hot-spot Byron Bay.Trees mark the corners of a swimming pool that seems to stretch off the hillside, while a multi-level terrace with alfresco sitting and dining areas follows the slope. It’s easy to entertain friends and family here, serving drinks from the outdoor bar and dinner from the outdoor kitchen.Even the great room feels immersed in the landscape, thanks to fold-away glass walls in the living area, louvered windows in the dining area, and a pass-through from the fully equipped kitchen. Dark woods and crisp whites invoke the tropical luxury pioneered by Bali’s resorts.Spread out not just in the great room, but in the 3 main-house bedrooms, a separate guest-house bedroom, and a bunk room perfect for children.From the villa’s setting in rural Wilsons Creek, it’s about 25 kilometers to Byron Bay and its beaches. Go swimming and surfing, spot humpback whales and dolphins, and walk to the iconic Cape Byron Lighthouse, the easternmost point in Australia. In town, stop at bakeries turning out flaky croissants and restaurants firing up pizzas. Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Gaze across age-old rice fields from the rooftop infinity pool of this contemporary masterpiece in Canggu. Cited by Elle Decoration as “one of the most beautiful homes in the world,” the architectural marvel offers charm after charm (a swim-up bar, a hidden library…) in graceful harmony with the precious landscapes of southern Bali. Explore the nearby temples at Tanah Lot and Petitgenet, and conquer the world-class surf-breaks of Seminyak and Berawa.The ground level of the home features a luminous great room built around a live palm tree. The superbly equipped kitchen overlooks a beautiful timber dining table and sunken living room, opening to the lower pool terrace. Here, the professional-grade bar serves a covered, in-pool lounge, yielding to a generous swimming zone over 2 meters in depth.The splendors continue upstairs, where an alluring glass wall opens to the secret library/study, which doubles as a home theater. The second infinity pool is located just beside the master suite and its private balcony. All of the bedrooms feature ensuite bathrooms with alfresco showers and soaking tubs.Mandala The House shares a well-equipped gym with its neighboring villa (known as Mandala The Home), and features a private chef among other deluxe services. The famed cafes and restaurants of downtown Seminyak are less than 8 kilometers away, while several of Bali’s finest beaches are within easy reach. Yogis and wellness travelers will find an abundance of spa retreats and natural cuisine nearby.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Sitting atop an inclination forged by lava rocks, this acre wide oceanside estate enjoys incredible ocean views and luxuriously appointed open concept indoor/outdoor living spaces. Located in one of the Big Island’s most elite resorts, Mauna Lani is sure to impress the most discerning travelers. With five beautiful ensuite bedrooms, Halekailani is perfect for a family reunion, high-end corporate retreat, golf getaway with fourteen friends. With its own putting green and two swimming pools, this beach house is more than a step above the rest.This large villa features spacious, two-story open concept living areas, decorated with stately designer furniture, elegant wood, and marble features, and incredibly scenic ocean views. The vast amount of space and openings to the terrace makes it easy for the fresh ocean breeze and natural sunlight to flow freely within. Numerous living areas can accommodate the whole group, as well as smaller spaces to break off for more intimate moments.Halekailani is lavishly outfitted with state of the art electronics, including Wi-Fi, a media room, satellite television, a fully equipped home gym, and an office. In the kitchen, the gourmet in your group will love all the gadgets, stainless steel appliances, and granite counters. The villa is also outfitted with a sauna, steam shower, and a fireplace to help set the mood for relaxation. Outside, there are several swimming and spa options, alfresco dining, a barbecue, and access to water sports equipment. Daily housekeeping, a twenty-four villa manager, and concierge services are all included as well.The Big Island is home to plenty of amazing natural wonders, whale and dolphin watching being among the most popular. The Kohala Coast is home to several great water sport and ocean excursion facilities, as well as even more pristine beachfront. If you’re on the island to golf, Mauna Lani has two scenic eighteen-hole courses, both within a few minutes drive of the villa. And, you’ll find restaurants, shopping, spa services, and tennis all within a ten-minute drive.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Indonesia’s ‘Island of Love’ is indisputably one the Earth’s most fascinating places, renowned for its sophisticated culture of arts, excellent surfing opportunities, ancient sacred temples and dazzling tropical scenery. Windu Estate can offer up to twelve Bali-bound travelers opulent accommodations with ten plush guest suites amid an estate replete with creature comforts. Located in Petitenget, Windu Estate is conveniently located in between high-end shopping, spas, restaurants, beaches, scenic mountain trails and totally immersed in the fascinating culture of Bali.Start each day at the Windu Estate with a freshly prepared breakfast by the on-site gourmet chef who works with the estate’s butler and housekeeper to attend to guests’ every need. A forty-five foot swimming pool provides ample space to cool off and have a splash, not far from a chic alfresco dining area for meals to be had in the great tropical outdoors. Additionally, the home lacks for nothing when it comes to modern technology, with cutting-edge entertainment units and Wi-Fi found throughout the home.The decor found here is both romantic and grandiose, featuring glamorous white stone colonnades, marble and wooden floors and stained-glass side windows all inspired from the elegant era belonging to the turn of the twentieth century. Shared meals are always a special occasion and will be an especially refined experience set on a grand dining table, comfortably seating twelve. The gourmet kitchen comes fully equipped with all appliances and boasts both style and utility.Windu Estate features seven master bedrooms out of ten spread over two separate residences. Bed options range from four-poster king size to super king size and double beds. Each room additionally boasts en-suite bathrooms, entertainment technology and access to balconies. The fluid and open design of Windu Estate brings the concept of indoor/outdoor living to a crescendo.Petitenget is located on the periphery of the bustling Seminyak district, so guests can choose to either participate in the lively nightlife found there or retreat to the peaceful grounds of Windu Estate on a dime. Aside from the spiritualism and natural beauty of Bali, gastronomy is also revered here with plenty of luxurious local and international restaurants geared to suit anyone’s taste. After a sumptuous meal, join the elite crowd at any one of Seminyak’s stylish beach clubs for the drinks, laughter and dazzling ocean views.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: This stunning villa in Ka'anapali, along Maui's western shore, features spectacular sunset views of the Pacific Ocean and the nearby islands of Lanai and Molokai. Situated just three minutes on foot from Kahekili Beach Park and within easy reach of some of the finest beaches and golf in Hawaii, the villa enjoys the exquisite serenity and comfort of a private resort, with outstanding alfresco living areas, superb interiors, and four enchanting bedrooms, including two master suites.Secluded amid lush tropical gardens, the ample terrace invites you to dreamy days in the Pacific breeze. Take a morning dip in the beautiful swimming pool, luxuriate on elegant sun loungers, and savor the breathtaking views. Returning from the beach in the afternoon, cook a barbecue lunch and relish it alfresco, before climbing into a hammock for a seaside siesta. At sunset, gather in the lounge for delicious cocktails and sublime vistas.Open walls join the terrace with the interior, creating a lovely flow of space and air. Savor a bottle of fine wine in the sumptuous central lounge under soaring ceilings, or watch your favorite shows in the adjoining living room. The beautiful dining table sets the scene for festive feasts, while the luminous kitchen, under a rustic ceiling, is fully equipped with chef-grade appliances. A sitting area beside the kitchen is perfect for sipping local coffee in the morning. The villa also features an excellent fitness room.The four bedroom suites are wonderfully elegant, spacious, and cozy, and all include deluxe ensuite bathrooms. There are two master suites, each with king bed, high ceilings, ample sitting areas, private balconies, and ocean views. One of the guest suites features a king bed, ocean views, and direct access to the terrace, while the other has two double beds, garden views, and a lovely stand-alone bath in its bathroom. With comfortable accommodations eight, Hawaiiana Hale is ideal for families and destination wedding guests.About a three-minute walk to Kahekili Beach, you're also just two miles to Kaanapali Beach, less than three to Black Rock, and an easy drive to Puamana Beach Park and Launiopoko Beach Park. The town of Lahaina is just four miles away. Golfers are just seven miles from The Plantation at Kapalua Golf.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.HAWAII TAX ID # TA-024-679-8336-01

listing.listing_description: Always wanted to try surfing? Now’s the time. You’ll find lessons, equipment rental, and Surfer’s Paradise Beach just steps from Penthouse 69. Rather keep dry? Shoot a round at Emerald Lake Golf Club, map out a hike through Springbrook National Park, or take the kids to SeaWorld. Before you head out, get the lay of the land over an alfresco breakfast on the terrace, gazing out over 260-degree views of Australia’s Gold Coast.Open your eyes each morning to an incredible ocean view. Next, sip Nespresso from the privacy of one of 69’s 2 scenic balconies. Head back inside to enjoy breakfast in the crisp, white interior, decorated with designer furnishings and contemporary accents. And, stretch out on the sofa while you contemplate plans for another exciting day in Australia. If you’ve decided to dine in, 69’s minimalistic kitchen is sure to inspire culinary creativity, and the formal and alfresco table settings give off a stylish vibe for every occasion.Subtracting travel time from the equation, The Soul Building makes it easy to keep up with daily routines in their state of the art gym. After a workout, cool down in the shared indoor/outdoor swimming pools or relax in the hot tub, sauna, and steam room. The kid's pool is a great place for the little ones to make friends. And, the barbeques, gardens, and alfresco dining areas of Soul are available for special events.Directly opposite of Surfer’s Paradise Beach, Penthouse 69 resides in the bustling lifestyle district, minutes from restaurants, nightlife, and theme parks. Spend your day's tanning, kite surfing, or golfing, before hitting the town for an evening of beachfront bar hopping. Feeling more laid-back? The Coast is lined with incredible lookouts, hiking trails, and national parks to explore, as well as many other pristine beach areas.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Discover the spirit of another time and the luxury of today. Completed in 2015, this exquisite 5-bedroom villa shares the essence of Hawaii through traditional design touches and lush garden surroundings. You’ll find 72-121 Pakui just off the 9th hole of Hualalai Golf Course, and from your location on resort grounds you’ll have access to 5-star amenities at the nearby Four Seasons Resort Hualalai. Create unforgettable memories along Big Island’s dazzling Kailua-Kona coast in the company of friends and family.The area was once the seat of Hawaiian royalty, and your villa is built to reflect the traditional grandeur of these polynesian palaces. Two long wings are surrounded by lush gardens, and a verdant courtyard cuts between them, leading to an open-air lounge. Lounge on designer deck furniture before cooling off in your private pool. Take your personal golf cart to the Four Seasons to enjoy fine dining, full gym, spa and much more. As the sun sets, gather your guests around the 10-place alfresco dining table for a barbecue feast.Inside, spacious, sundrenched rooms flow effortlessly from one into another. Natural materials such as raffia ceiling panels, warm local wood and smooth stone flooring enhance the traditional ambiance. The immense great room reveals divinely soft lounge sets, and impressive landscape expressions adorn the walls. The gourmet kitchen is paradise for chefs, allowing you to prepare memorable creations on the finest stainless-steel appliance; all with captivating vistas in full view.Elegance. There’s no better word to describe the soothing atmosphere you’ll encounter in each beautifully appointed bedrooms. From the Master suite’s towering, four-poster bed to hardwood furnishings, you’ll find uninterrupted peace and tranquility. The Master suite leads directly out to the garden. Its spa-inspired ensuite boasts a lava-rock alfresco shower. The guests bedrooms each hold king beds, and house their own ensuites.If sand and sea lured you to Hawaii, you’ll be pleased to find a pristine stretch of sand within walking distance of your villa. Explore the lower Kona coast where you can snorkel or swim in clear, calm waters. Historic Kailua-Kona was the home of Hawaiian royalty and also offers fantastic shopping and dining options. The Big Island’s wide-open roads are made for exploring, and it is well worth visiting the island’s many coffee plantations to enjoy the flavor of Hawaii.Copyright © 2015 Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: The indoors and out meet seamlessly at Hale Hoaloha. And the outdoors are spectacular, with views of Mauna Kea, the ocean and even Maui in the distance. Built between two top-tier hotels on the grounds of the Mauna Lani Resort, this luxury vacation rental offers guests access to the amenities of both. You’ll enjoy resort-worthy views in a private setting for a family reunion, destination wedding or whatever else you want to celebrate.Step through the villa’s classic stone courtyard and into your own private tropical paradise. Pocket glass doors open the house to an expansive lanai with sitting and dining areas, an outdoor kitchen with a gas barbecue and plenty of loungers grouped around an infinity pool and hot tub. Let the Big Island breeze lull you to sleep in the hammock, or gather around the firepit for some incredible stargazing in the night sky over the world’s most remote island chain.More than 5,500 square feet of beautifully appointed living space lets you truly relax at Hale Hoaloha. The open-plan interiors are a mix of traditional Hawaiian style and modern touches, from the vaulted ceilings, quartzite floors and warm Ohia wood and mahogany finishes to the sleek sofas and sculptural accent tables. A thoughtful floor plan makes it easy to entertain, with a wet bar adjoining the living room and a window-lined formal dining area just off the fully equipped kitchen.Each of the villa’s five bedrooms has an ensuite bathroom and opens to a terrace. A king bed, alfresco shower, jetted tub and private terrace make the master bedroom just as plush as any honeymoon suite. There are two other bedrooms with king beds, one with a queen bed and one with two queen and twin bunk beds, so the property can easily accommodate groups of friends, couples, or families traveling with children.With the Fairmont Orchid Hotel on one side of Hale Hoaloha and Mauna Lani Bay Hotel on the other, you’ll never want for activities. Walk to the white sands of the exclusive Pauoa Beach Club at the Fairmont for sunbathing, swimming and oceanfront bars and restaurants. Or take the golf cart included in your holiday to Mauna Lani, which has its own stretch of beach, a gourmet grocery, tennis, 36 holes of championship golf and more.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.HAWAII TAX ID #: 029-002-9568-01STVR-19-350996

listing.listing_description: It doesn’t get any better than a beachfront villa with an amazing ocean view, and Villa Vedas designers appreciate that fact too. With an ocean-facing, unobstructed twenty-two-meter span, the ocean view is absolutely spectacular from nearly every interior space. The Sea, the sand, and the sun are harmoniously integrated into this luxurious five-bedroom. You’re sure to fall in love with Bali’s gorgeous sunsets, lush palm trees, and relaxing beach atmosphere on your next Luxury Retreats vacation.What sets Villa Vedas apart from the rest is its customizability. Architects make use of frameless Hafele glass walls throughout the entire house, allowing guests to fully open the walls and living spaces to the fresh ocean breeze and natural sunlight, or close spaces off to enjoy the air conditioning. Open concept design and spacious interior areas make Vedas a great spot for hosting, as does its bar, sound system, indoor and outdoor dining for twenty, and free-flowing environment. Eclectic works of art, designer furniture, and high-end electronics are Vedas decor. Plenty of rich wood tones give the villa a warm, relaxing vibe, while white walls and stone flooring set an elegant tone, making Vedas a dynamic vacation destination.Outside, Vedas has an amazing terrace with lots of space for guests to socialize in a large group, or break-off for some secluded alone time. There are two swimming pools, lots of sun loungers, a barbecue, and an outdoor sound system. And, of course, there’s the beautiful beachfront and ocean view.Bali has plenty of beautiful beachfront to explore up and down its coast. With thirty-kilometres you’ll find Belong, Echo, and Canggu Beaches, all great spots to spend a sunny afternoon. If you’re looking for something more adventurous, visit Bali Safari and Marine Park to experience what life is like for the creatures that inhabit the area. Bali’s Treetop Adventure Park is another exciting place to observe the local environment and perfect if you’re traveling with kids.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Brave the wilderness in style at this epic log cabin home overlooking the Clutha River in southern New Zealand. Gaze upon the snow-capped peaks from the master’s king bed. Take your morning coffee for a stroll across lush lawns down to the river’s edge, and enjoy while you plan out your day. Then, head to the ski slopes of Treble Cone or Cardrona Alpine Resort, about 50-km from home. Feel the warmth of River Ridge’s imposing timber frame, featuring logs shipped from British Columbia, assembled by local artisan craftsman. Wander the different lounge areas, great room, and bedrooms, and you’ll see how each piece of wood is truly unique. The kitchen adds a touch of modern brightness to the rustic-chic atmosphere, creating the perfect setting to try your hand at a local dish. After a long day of skiing, return home to warm yourself by the wood-burning fireplace. Before dinner in the 8-seat formal setting, unwind with an episode of a new series on Smart TV. After you’ve eaten, whip up a few cocktails at the kitchen’s bar and head to the games room for a pool match. In the warmer months, move the party outside to the 15-seat alfresco set and pick up some fresh to grill on the barbecue. Grab your hiking boots and camera, and drive 21-km to Mount Aspiring National Park to check out the trails and snap a few pics at the scenic lookout stops. When you’re ready to emerge from the wild, head to Wanaka Town to explore their boutique shops, quaint cafes, and local pubs and restaurants. If you find yourself longing for city life, Queenstown is about an hour’s drive from River Ridge. Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Let yourself be enchanted by the lush surroundings and panoramic coastal views at Mendaka. This incredible vacation rental on the grassy tropical island of Sumba belongs to the owner of the Nihi Sumba Resort, which was rated the number one hotel in the world by Travel + Leisure in 2016. Book the five individual villas that make up this luxury property for an upscale family reunion, an idyllic getaway with friends or a warm-weather destination wedding.Your stay at Nihi Sumba includes butler service, in-villa dining, three meals each day and non-alcoholic beverages, with spa treatments and excursions available at extra cost. Spend your holiday by the infinity pool overlooking the ocean or underneath the waterfall, which cascades into a pool and hides a secret massage cave at its base. Listen to the waves from the loungers and daybeds on the beachfront terrace, or while enjoying a drink or meal at the outdoor living and dining areas.Tucked into verdant landscaping for privacy, the charming villas were inspired by traditional Sumbanese architecture, with thatched roofs and breezy layouts. The living and dining spaces use local pieces throughout, from carvings and antiques to vibrant ikat prints. Soft-hued Sulawesi marble floors inlaid with teak are a luxe touch underfoot, and built-in bookcases and woven ceiling panels add warmth to the rooms.Each of the five villas has its own private plunge pool, as well as a bedroom with a king bed, en-suite bathroom, lounge area and balcony overlooking the ocean. The arrangement of the villas makes each one feel secluded, letting you use any of them for a honeymoon-style romantic escape.The hidden-away charms of Mendaka are just a short walk from the shared amenities at Nihiwatu, from the beach club and boathouse to the restaurant, bars and even a chocolate factory. Stroll the stretch of private beach, sign up for a surf lesson, follow a local guide on a horseback ride or book a treatment on a “spa safari” to a stunning nearby valley.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Take in serene Lake Wakatipu and cloud-capped Tooth Peaks from this sustainable, luxury home on the slopes of Mt Crichton. The open-plan design gives way to huge viewpoint windows, providing a peerless view of the South Island wilds. Complete with huge dining table, fun chill zones, luxurious living room and space-age kitchen, outdoor pursuits and the lights of Queensland are both close by.Experience an exceptional kind of accommodation experience at Bob’s Cove, which erases the traditional boundaries between kitchen, leisure space, and recreation zones, facilitating a more collective experience while still providing the best of space and comfort. This wonderfully welcoming home is perched alongside a natural paradise, with the wall-length windows facilitate easy viewing. With climate control and fashionable decor complete with touches of varied world culture, guests can collectively recline in true comfort in front of the retro-styled fireplace, or find their own spots to curl up with a book or tablet. The walkways around the house ensure guests can stroll and breathe the pure air of the South Island mountains at any time of time of day or evening.This villa is ideally placed to make the most of both New Zealand’s wilderness, and the happening action at the nearby hub of Queensland. Take to the lake for exciting kayaking or yacht outings on the pristine water, or drive to 1 of the several stunning view points to take in the natural splendor. Mountain hikers will be spoilt for choice, with local trails and more challenging peak ascents available close by. Meanwhile, the varied gastronomical hub of Queensland is just a short drive away, making for a very convenient evening outing. With the excitement of the Skycity Casino close by, guests can choose from a huge range of diverse outings.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Surround yourself with lush greenery on the rugged coast of Sydney at this stylish ocean-view villa. Sip your morning Espresso beneath the shaded section of the terrace while the kids splash around in the pool. In the afternoon, lay in the sunbed and work on your tan. In the evening, grab your camera and head to the Rocks, Sydney’s entertainment district and home of the Opera House.Feel the warmth of the villa’s wood-clad walls set against the creamy-white, clutter-free interior. Stretch out in modern designer furniture. The living room’s double-sided sofa does a perfect job connecting indoor and outdoor social spaces, letting the party flow where it may. Floor-to-ceiling openings to the terrace and balconies let panoramic views of the ocean set the tone for your unique getaway.After a morning stroll on the beach, stop into a local market and pick up something fresh to grill for lunch. After the appropriate 30-minutes, hop into the swimming pool to cool off. Then, head inside to search the Smart TV for some Rugby or Australian Football. The villa’s air conditioning will set the mood for an afternoon nap, and the media room is the perfect place to relax with family.There’s no shortage of beachfront in the Clontarf area, the closest being Chinaman’s Beach, which is 2 minutes by foot. If you’re in the mood to party, Bondi Beach is the spot. The streets surrounding Bondi are home to some of the country’s most popular nightlife, shopping, and dining destinations. For some family fun, take the kids to Taronga Zoo to meet some of the local wildlife.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Enjoy a quiet holiday save for the sound of the waves at Villa Seaside. Set on the water’s edge in South Coogee, this Sydney vacation rental is a wonderful honeymoon from the everyday for up to eight friends or family members. Of course, if you’d like to explore the city, it’s just a short drive from several beaches and must-sees such as the opera house and Sydney Harbour Bridge.Savor the sea views from an oceanfront terrace with a swimming pool, loungers and an outdoor shower. After a day at the beach or sightseeing, watch a favorite show on the satellite TV, bring snacks to the media room or keep in touch with friends at home via Wi-Fi.Glass walls and a thoughtful multi-story layout let the views be the star of the villa’s sleek, modern rooms. While there are two levels of open-plan living and dining rooms facing the water, the main great room also includes a fully equipped kitchen. Vibrant art and accent pieces from across Asia make this luxury property feel like the residence of a well-traveled friend with exquisite taste.Villa Seaside has one bedroom with a king bed and three bedrooms with queen beds. Three of the bedrooms have private en-suite bathrooms, and one of the queen bedrooms has access to a hall bathroom. Like the great room, the bedrooms pair art from around the world with clean-lined contemporary architecture.The villa is just a short drive or walk from Coogee Beach and the beautiful coastline walk between Coogee and Bondi, as well as a short distance from several other beaches. If you’d like to check a few items off your bucket list, it’s also easy to drive to the iconic Sydney Opera House or the soaring arch of the Sydney Harbour Bridge.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: A spiral staircase seems to rise out of the pool and a rooftop-deck glass floor seems to float above the ground at this contemporary villa among the Bali rice fields. Its angular steel and glass lines are softened by wood-paneled ceilings—and by the staircase curve as it leads toward 360-degree views. In 10 minutes you can be ordering a coffee or on the massage table at a spa in Seminyak Square. Slow your routine to a Bali-like pace with the help of the housekeeper and butler, a turquoise swimming pool that runs partly underneath the house, outdoor lounging and dining areas, and a barbecue. Sip a cocktail or smoothie from the al-fresco wet bar as you watch the stars come out over the Badung Regency from the rooftop terrace. At the heart of this luxury property is an atrium with the spiral staircase, wrapping around a palm tree. Just off this airy space is the white-walled living room and fully equipped kitchen, which is dominated by its own floating staircase in glossy black. Convene with friends and family at the breakfast bar for a coffee or snack before your next activity. This vacation rental has 3 bedrooms with king beds: a honeymoon-worthy master suite with a private balcony, plus 2 others. There’s also a bedroom with 2 twin beds. All 4 bedrooms have en-suite bathrooms and air conditioning. Though it feels like a quiet holiday retreat, Villa Srilanksmi is only a 10-minute drive from the restaurants and shops of Seminyak Square, where you can find the perfect souvenir at the flea market, try Indonesian cuisine, or book a spa treatment. Head to sandy Batu Belig Beach to watch the sunset, then make an evening of it at one of the bars just off the beach. Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Pass sun-kissed days and star-splashed nights on the west coast of Maui at The Kahana House. Not only is this oceanfront Napili vacation rental perfectly situated for sunset views, it’s also close to great beaches, challenging golf courses, and plenty of shopping and dining options. Thoughtfully designed interiors and five bedrooms make the property ideal for groups of up to ten.Soak in the Hawaiian sunshine from outdoor living areas with a pool, hot tub, loungers and barbecue, or enjoy the shade of a lanai with sitting and dining areas. After watching the sun sink into the Pacific, flip on the satellite television or share snaps of your holiday with friends and family at home via Wi-Fi.Unique architecture and custom woodwork set this luxury residence apart from other island villas. A sweeping staircase with a whimsical pineapple for a finial sets the tone right at the entrance: dramatic yet inviting. The open-plan living area, dining area and fully equipped kitchen are separated only by columns and a step, and all open to the lanai so you can enjoy warm breezes and ocean views from indoors.The Kahana House has two bedrooms with king beds, including a master suite with a private balcony, two bedrooms with queen beds and one bedroom with a twin bed. All five bedrooms have en-suite bathrooms, air conditioning and ceiling fans.Maui’s pristine beaches, laid-back vibe and wide range of activities will enchant everyone from families on a beach vacation to honeymooners seeking tropical romance. A stay at The Kahana House puts you just a few miles from several beaches, including the golden expanse of Ka’anapali Beach, golf courses, and shopping and dining at Whalers Village and in downtown Lahaina. It’s well worth taking a morning to make the drive to Haleakala National Park to watch the sunrise from the dormant volcano’s peak.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.HAWAII TAT W18494214-01STWM 2013/0009

listing.listing_description: Nothing interrupts the Lake Taupo views from these two modern homes except your own private pools. The villas may be the only civilization in 58 acres of bushland, but hot tubs, sun-splashed terraces, and airy rooms with glass walls and vaulted ceilings mean they’re quite civilized indeed. Discover the area by boat, on a cycle on the Great Lake Trail, or on a fishing trip in search of local trout. Each villa has its own outdoor living areas with a swimming pool, hot tub, sitting and dining furniture, and a barbecue. In the evenings, you can flip on the gas fireplace and set the mood with the sound system, or stay in touch with the outside world via Wi-Fi. An espresso machine will fuel your outdoor adventures, and laundry facilities will help you start each activity with fresh gear. Fold-away glass walls and vaulted ceilings give you the luxury of enjoying the glorious New Zealand scenery from the comfort of the wicker sofas in the villas’ living rooms. Fry up locally caught trout in the fully equipped kitchens and reconnect with friends and family around the dining tables. This vacation rental includes one 2-bedroom house and one 3-bedroom house. All 5 bedrooms have en-suite bathrooms, and several have lake views. While they can accommodate up to 10 guests, the smaller villa could also be a retreat for in-laws wanting a quieter holiday or a couple wanting honeymoon-style privacy. The Point Estate is a 1-minute drive from the Taupo Maori Carving, which towers above the waters of the lake. It’s also a short drive from the roaring blue waters of Huka Falls, where the lake drains out of its caldera, and the shops and restaurants in the town of Taupo. Thirsty travelers can also plan to visit the craft breweries and wineries outside of downtown. Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: The Nihi Sumba resort is a world leader in eco-hotel design and it has been named Travel and Leisure Magazine’s “Number 1 Hotel in the World”. Built on the upper most part of the Estate, the luxurious Puncak villa looks out over a lush organic garden, and on to a spectacular ocean view. It’s the perfect setting for enjoying an amazing Indonesian island vacation.The first thing you’ll notice about Puncak is all of the vibrant colours of the environment. Blue ocean, green vegetation, and bright flowers, all under the glowing sun. The villa is decorated and designed with all of that in mind. Hay roofs, locally sourced wood, and natural ventilation decrease Puncak’s ecological footprint, while comfortable furniture, high end appliances, and all of life’s modern amenities add luxury to the island experience.Inside the villa you’ll find all the comforts of home - Wi-Fi, television, air-conditioning, lounge areas, and anything else you need to be comfortable. But, outside is where all the action is. There’s an infinity pool and a plunge pool on the terrace, numerous outdoor living and dining spaces, sun loungers, sun beds, and even a semi-submerged lounge area in the pool. If you’d rather swim in the ocean, just head down to the private beach. And, to make things even easier, the Nihi Sumba Resort takes care of the minibar, butler service, housekeeping, meals and snacks, and private in-villa dining.Each bedroom villa at Puncak is a beautiful private oasis. Luxurious king size canopy beds, lounge areas, and private balconies with ocean views are features of all three. As well, each bedroom has an ensuite bathroom with stand-alone rain shower and dual vanity. Two of the bedrooms are located in the main villa, with the living room, while the third is located just across, on the other side of the pool.Within walking distance you’ll find the beachfront Boat House Bar, Nio Beach Club, and wonderful open-air restaurants, all within the Nihi estate.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Recharge your body, mind, and spirit in beautiful Bali, at Villa Padi. Located on Bali’s Southwestern coast, a few kilometers from the iconic Tanah Lot Temple, Villa Padi is a four bedroom getaway within the Alami Resort. Padi’s well-manicured property features three independent bedroom villas, alfresco dining, kitchen, and lounge pavilions, and a main house with the master bedroom. All of Padi’s separate pavilions and villas are focused around the swimming pool, tropical gardens, and an outstanding view of neighboring rice fields. Within fifteen minutes of Alami, you’ll be able to visit Bali’s famous black sand beaches, at Pantai Pasut, Pantai Klecung, and many more.Balinese architecture is extremely influential in the vacation community because it is undeniably relaxing to equally incorporate natural features into the functional space of a rental villa. The vast property makes it easy to gather as a group or break away for more intimate moments. With each bedroom existing in its own standalone unit, you’ll appreciate an extra level of privacy during your stay. All four bedrooms come with king-sized beds, en-suite bathrooms, and air conditioning. Padi’s interior spaces are decorated in warm wood tones, with spacious peaked ceilings, and an intriguing collection of Balinese art.On the Alami Resort property, there is an incredible restaurant that serves local and international dishes crafted by their experienced chefs. The spa and yoga facilities are perfect places to treat yourself. And, if you’re planning a special event, Alami has numerous dining options.Bali’s Tabanan region is loaded with natural wonders, historical sites, and tourist attractions to discover, either on your own or you can check in with Alami Resort, who offer a wide range of activity and excursion packages. A great place to start is Tanah Lot, an ancient temple, shaped by the tides and built on an offshore rock formation. For a night out, Seminyak is where you’ll find fine dining, bars, and nightclubs. If you’re feeling adventurous, head south to Kuta for a surfing lesson. And, for an unforgettable day trip, visit the butterflies at Jati Luwih Rice Terraces, one of Bali’s most important landmarks, and a UNESCO World Heritage Site.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Bring the boat north from Sidney to a waterway home in Palm Beach where deep blue waters beckon you to heel and tack. The large two-story stone house sits facing the beach where the sun streams into spacious, comfortable rooms. Earthy décor, rough bleached stone, and 2 huge balconies take center place for alfresco dining, lounging, and water activity watching. The house is near Ku-ring-gai Chase national park, and is part of the northern beaches peninsula. Everyone gets up early for the fishing, boating, kayaking, and sailing where being on the water is what Pittwater is all about. A slice of golden sandy beach abuts Pittwater’s garden so you can pull up lawn chairs and grab binoculars to get a more intimate view of the active bustling waterway. After a full day, everyone can settle in with state-of-the-art digital streaming, a cozy fire in the fireplace, and the nightly debate over which movie to watch, while snacks and drinks are being prepared. Golfing is just a walk to Palm Beach Golf Club, it’s 6 minutes to Avalon Golf course, Mona Vale Golf course 12km. History buffs will want to visit the Barrenjoey Lighthouse on the eastern headland. Built in 1881 and sitting on the northernmost seaside promontory. Bring a camera as it has spectacular panoramic views and is only 5 minutes away. Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Enjoy the luxuriously effortless amenities of the Four Seasons Hualalai Resort and the privacy of your own secluded vacation home at Hainoa 19. This spacious three-bedroom is perfect for families who appreciate the ease of resort vacationing, but prefer a higher level of privacy. Located on the Big Island, this Hawaiian home embraces its beautiful surroundings every chance it gets with numerous spaces that open to the outdoors, and promote an open-air vibe that is sure to relax and rejuvenate its guests. Nearby, you’ll find the sandy beach, golf, tennis, dining, and nightlife, all within a short walk or drive.Dark stained wood and earthy tones give the villa a warm and welcoming atmosphere, while designer furnishings and state of the art electronics add a touch of sophistication. The open concept kitchen, dining, and lounge area feature a room length opening to the terrace, increasing Hainoa’s hosting space, and promoting a great social atmosphere. In the kitchen, you’ll love the “L” shape layout with its functional island and stainless steel appliances, sure to inspire culinary creativity. The interior is equipped with air conditioning, cable television, Wi-Fi, a stereo, and a washer and dryer.Outside, you’ll love spending your afternoons lounging in the expansive lanai. Later, enjoy an alfresco dinner prepared on the terrace’s barbecue. If you’d like to explore the Four Seasons, hop into one of two provided golf carts and head out to visit the beach, golf course, tennis facility, spa, fitness center, and restaurants, all within the resort.If you feel like doing some shopping, or you’d like to find a few more options for dinner, head to Waikoloa Beach Resort, which features two luxurious shopping centers and numerous international restaurants. If it’s city life you crave, Kona is just twenty minutes by car. There, you’ll find even more dining opportunities, boutique shops, and plenty of exciting nightlife.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.HAWAII TAX ID #:W57023346-01
